item.description:
Christian Mysticism is about being with God ~ about listening in deep meditation and prayer to receive God within. It is about Love, not dogma or theology. Christian Mystics go beyond opinion, beyond belief, and beyond blind faith into real experiences that can only come from knowing our Creator, who loved us enough to create us. Have you lost this connection to God? God is patiently waiting for you to reclaim it. Come to this seminar to discover a thoroughly modern and vitally alive way of living a spiritual life in a material world.
Bring a friend for free!

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Christian Mysticism: Modern and Meaningful Spirituality -- A Seminar
